conbody.p: The Reprocessor stream aggregates rejected records into batches and stores each batch as a separate file on the SFTP server. The number of records in a batch is defined with CG Rejection Distributor Node parameter RecordsPerBatch. In addition to the count rule, a (potentially smaller) file is generated after a specified timeout since receving the first rejected record. The timeout is specified with node parameter SecondsPerBatch. Inside the files, records are stored using the format in which they were received by the Business logic stream.
